name: Rift Keeper
description: Embark on your journey, travel through rifts and restore the balance as the Rift Keeper in this handcrafted 2D roguelite platformer with challenging, fast-paced action gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 equivalent. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 460 GTX or equivalent. Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 560 GTX or equivalent. Storage: 2 GB available space
